profile:
505-Junk is a full service junk removal and recycling business in Vancouver, British Columbia. Our junk removal Vancouver truck teams remove unwanted clutter from the homes, business, and construction sites of our clients in an efficient and professional manner. 

Our goal is to recycle as many items as possible and to donate any reusable items to charities throughout Vancouver. We have recycled hundreds of thousands of pounds of items to date, keeping our city greener than ever! Contact us today at (604)-505-5865.

505-Junk was a finalist for Small Business BC's Best Community Impact and Best Online Marketer Awards, a winner of the Delta Chamber of Commerce's Rising Star Award, a winner of the Richmond Chamber of Commerce's Young Entrepreneur of the Year award, and won the Homestars.com Best of Award in 2012. The company has been featured on CTV, Breakfast Television, and DeltaTv, and has been featured in the National Post, Vancouver Sun, and several local newspapers for their business efforts. 

If you have any questions or would like to work with us, please call us at 604-505-5865 and we would be more than happy to help. 

Products:
Junk Removal, Rubbish Removal, Appliance Recycling, Mattress Recycling, Construction Debris Clean up, Garage Clean Outs, Attic Clean Outs, Yard Trimmings Removal, Hoarder Clean Ups, and much more.
service_area: Tsawwassen, Ladner, North Delta, Richmond, Burnaby, Vancouver, West Vancouver, North Vancouver, New Westminster, Surrey, White Rock
products: Junk Removal, Rubbish Removal, Appliance Recycling, Mattress Recycling, Construction Debris Clean up, Garage Clean Outs, Attic Clean Outs, Yard Trimmings Removal, Hoarder Clean Ups, and much more.
services: Our teams are capable of removing any unwanted material from your home, apartment, construction site, or business in a timely and professional manner.
specialities: We innovated the industry in 2015 by installing onboard Measurement Canada certified scale systems onto all of our trucks. This enables us to be transparent with our pricing as we charge by the weight of the material we take away. Our unique service made us a finalist for Small Business BCâ€™s Best Concept Award. Additionally, we are now able to provide live diversion tracking for recyclable, donatable, and garbage items.

profile:
Green Coast Rubbish is a family owned and operated full service junk removal company based in North Vancouver, BC. Since 2006 we have provided environmentally conscious disposal services by employing sustainable waste diversion and recycling practices at a competitive price throughout the lower mainland of Vancouver. We also do demolition and deconstruction jobs ranging from tree houses to entire home teardowns. 

At Green Coast Rubbish, we pride ourselves on being an active member within the community, offering professional, courteous, and hassle-free service in an industry that is full of rubbish.

In 2016, we managed to reduce our greenhouse gas emissions per 1K revenue by 45%. Additionally, in 2017 we also achieved a 79% diversion rate and recycled over 550 tonnes of material. Feel free to contact us at 604.230.4530.


Accomplishments & Awards:

2017 - BBB's Community Excellence Award Recipient 
2016 - NVCC Business of the Year Finalist 
2016 - BBB's Green Torch Award Recipient
2016 - RCBC Environmental Award
2013 - BBB's Green Torch Award Recipient
2013 - Voted the 'Best Green Business" on the North Shore by the Outlook  
2012 - Winner of the "BC Ideas: Solutions for Strong Communities" competition
2012 - Small Business BC's top 5 'Best Green Businesses' of BC
 
Services:

Professional Junk Removal & Recycling, Mattress Recycling, Furniture Removal & Recycling, Office Furniture Removal, Electronic Waste Recycling, Construction & Renovation Waste Removal & Recycling, Garbage Removal, Waste Hauling, Wood Recycling & Removal, Metal Recycling, Concrete Demolition & Recycling. Demolition Services, including but not limited to: removing old sheds, tree forts, car ports, gutting bathroom, kitchens, apartments & condo's, complete home & warehouse tear downs. You name it, we can deconstruct or demolish it. 

SPECIALTIES:

We go that extra step to ensure that your debris is recycled and or donated. As such, in 2016 we achieved an 82% diversion rate. That's over 540 tonnes of material diverted from our local landfill to alternative recycling and recovery waste stream sources. Furthermore, since 2010 we have diverted an impressive 2546.22 tonnes or 5,613,454.21 pounds of waste material away from our landfills.

To find out more about who we are, what we do, and how we are involved in the community please visit our site: greencoastrubbish.com.
